ModMetaData.name: ideology expansion
ModMetaData.author: boomer
ModMetaData.description: Currently: - Allows nutrient paste to be used with any meme except Flesh Purity, Rancher, and Cannibal - Increases tree pruning speed: 0.01 -> 0.02 - Moves Proselytizer to low impact - Overhauls Individualist - Overhauls Loyalist - Removes Trees: Desired precept from Gauranlen Connection meme - Renames Tree connection meme to Gauranlen connection
